title: Google Pixel 7a - Unlocked Android Cell Phone - Smartphone with Wide Angle Lens and 24-Hour Battery - 128 GB – Charcoal
description: Meet Pixel 7a, engineered by Google. It’s powered by the Google Tensor G2 chip, so it’s super fast and secure, and designed for extra online protection with VPN by Google One.[1,11] The Pixel Camera takes amazing photos and videos, and even helps you breathe life into old pictures with its advanced features. And the battery lasts all day.[2] All for less than you think.
